Properties.ProtectedString:
--By QuantumSama
local DURATION = 30
function WaitForChild(parent, child) local result = parent:FindFirstChild(child) delay(3,function() if not result then print("Warning: Long wait for", child) end end) while not result do parent.ChildAdded:wait() result = parent:FindFirstChild(child) end return result end
local Outfits = { [1] = { ["Transparency"] = 1, --cursed hand ["Mesh"] = {37241605,37241842,Vector3.new(3.2,3.2,3.2)} }, [2] = { ["Transparency"] = 1, --floating eyeball ["Mesh"] = {1185246,16855066,Vector3.new(3.2,3.2,3.2)} }, [3] = { ["Shirt"] = 91488794, ["Package"] = { --Zombie ["LeftArm"] = {0,63639263,63639334}, ["LeftLeg"] = {0,63639276,63639334}, ["RightArm"] = {0,63639283,63639334}, ["RightLeg"] = {0,63639288,63639334}, ["Torso"] = {0,63639291,63639334} }, ["Hat"] = {63639945,63639451,Vector3.new(1,1,1)} }, [4] = { ["Package"] = { --werewolf ["LeftArm"] = {0,37689083,37689298}, ["LeftLeg"] = {0,37689111,37689298}, ["RightArm"] = {0,37689140,37689298}, ["RightLeg"] = {0,37689206,37689298}, ["Torso"] = {0,37689237,37689298} }, ["Hat"] = {15010063,37689298, Vector3.new(1.65,1.5,1.5)} }, [5] = { ["Transparency"] = .8}, --ghost [6] = { ["Package"] = { --mummy ["LeftArm"] = {0,63637682,63637809}, ["LeftLeg"] = {0,63637691,63637809}, ["RightArm"] = {0,63637701,63637809}, ["RightLeg"] = {0,63637711,63637809}, ["Torso"] = {0,63637732,63637809} }, ["Hat"] = {63638055,63638307, Vector3.new(1,1,1)} }, [7] = { ["Package"] = { --Skeleton ["LeftArm"] = {0,36780032,36780292}, ["LeftLeg"] = {36780292,36780079,36780292}, ["RightArm"] = {0,36780156,36780292}, ["RightLeg"] = {0,36780195,36780292}, ["Torso"] = {0,36780113,36780292} }, ["Hat"] = {36869983,36869975, Vector3.new(1,1,1)} }, [8] = { ["Transparency"] = 1, --pumpkin ["Mesh"] = {1158007,5251789,Vector3.new(1.35,1.35,1.35)} }, [9] = { ["Transparency"] = 1, --bat ["Hat"] = {37223772,37223767,Vector3.new(2.5,2.5,2.5)} }, [10] = { ["Transparency"] = 1, --spider ["Mesh"] = {64485380,80857256,Vector3.new(3.5,3.5,3.5), CFrame.new(0,-1.3,0)} }, [11] = { ["Transparency"] = 1, --Specter ["Mesh"] = {42579239,42578558,Vector3.new(9,9,9)} }, [12] = { ["Transparency"] = 1, --terrordactyl ["Mesh"] = {64041667,64041707,Vector3.new(3,3,3)} }, [13] = { ["Transparency"] = 1, --Evil Duck ["Mesh"] = {14810664,14810649,Vector3.new(6.5,6.5,6.5), CFrame.new(0,-.4,0)} } }
local Character = script.Parent local newClothing = {} local oldClothing = {}
function TakeOffOutfit() if Character then for i, item in pairs(oldClothing) do if item then item.Parent = Character end end for i,part in pairs(Character:GetChildren()) do if part:IsA("Part") then part.Transparency = 0 end if part:IsA("Hat") then local handle = part:FindFirstChild("Handle") if handle then handle.Transparency = 0 end end end local head = Character:FindFirstChild("Head") if head then for i,decal in pairs(head:GetChildren()) do if decal:IsA("Decal") then decal.Transparency = 0 end end end end oldClothing = {} for i, v in pairs(newClothing) do if v then v:Destroy() end end newClothing = {} end
local outfitChanges = 0
function SetOutfit(outfitNumber) print('wearing outfit', outfitNumber) outfitChanges = outfitChanges+1 TakeOffOutfit() local OutfitItems = Outfits[outfitNumber] if not OutfitItems then print('bad outfit number') return end
local hum = Character:FindFirstChild("Humanoid") local torso = Character:FindFirstChild("Torso") local head = Character:FindFirstChild("Head") if hum and torso and head then local oldHeadColor = head.BrickColor local curCam = game.Workspace.CurrentCamera local oldShirt = Character:FindFirstChild("Shirt") local oldTShirt = Character:FindFirstChild("TShirt") local oldPants = Character:FindFirstChild("Pants") oldClothing = {oldShirt, oldTShirt, oldPants}
newClothing = {} if OutfitItems["Transparency"] then for i,part in pairs(Character:GetChildren()) do if part:IsA("Part") then part.Transparency = OutfitItems["Transparency"] end if part:IsA("Hat") then local handle = part:FindFirstChild("Handle") if handle then handle.Transparency = OutfitItems["Transparency"] end end end for i,decal in pairs(head:GetChildren()) do if decal:IsA("Decal") then decal.Transparency = OutfitItems["Transparency"] end end end if OutfitItems["Shirt"] then if oldShirt then oldShirt.Parent = nil end local newShirt = Instance.new("Shirt") newShirt.ShirtTemplate = "http://www.roblox.com/asset/?id=" .. OutfitItems["Shirt"] newShirt.Parent = Character table.insert(newClothing, newShirt) end if OutfitItems["Pants"] then if oldPants then oldPants.Parent = nil end local newPants = Instance.new("Pants") newPants.PantsTemplate = "http://www.roblox.com/asset/?id=" .. OutfitItems["Pants"] newPants.Parent = Character table.insert(newClothing, newPants) end if OutfitItems["Hat"] then local hatPart = Instance.new("Part") hatPart.CanCollide = false hatPart.FormFactor = "Custom" hatPart.Size = Vector3.new(.5,.5,.5) local hatMesh = Instance.new("SpecialMesh") hatMesh.MeshId = "http://www.roblox.com/asset/?id=" .. OutfitItems["Hat"][1] hatMesh.TextureId = "http://www.roblox.com/asset/?id=" .. OutfitItems["Hat"][2] hatMesh.Scale = OutfitItems["Hat"][3] hatMesh.Parent = hatPart hatPart.Parent = Character local hatWeld = Instance.new("Weld") hatWeld.Part0 = hatPart hatWeld.Part1 = head hatWeld.Parent = hatPart table.insert(newClothing, hatPart) end if OutfitItems["Mesh"] then local meshPart = Instance.new("Part") meshPart.CanCollide = false meshPart.FormFactor = "Custom" meshPart.Size = Vector3.new(.5,.5,.5) local partMesh = Instance.new("SpecialMesh") partMesh.MeshId = "http://www.roblox.com/asset/?id=" .. OutfitItems["Mesh"][1] partMesh.TextureId = "http://www.roblox.com/asset/?id=" .. OutfitItems["Mesh"][2] partMesh.Scale = OutfitItems["Mesh"][3] partMesh.Parent = meshPart meshPart.Parent = Character local meshWeld = Instance.new("Weld") meshWeld.Part0 = meshPart meshWeld.Part1 = torso if OutfitItems["Mesh"][4] then meshWeld.C1 = OutfitItems["Mesh"][4] end meshWeld.Parent = partMesh table.insert(newClothing, meshPart) end if OutfitItems["Package"] then for i, v in pairs(Character:GetChildren()) do if v:IsA("CharacterMesh") then v.Parent = nil table.insert(oldClothing, v) end end for bodyPart, ids in pairs(OutfitItems["Package"]) do local newMesh = Instance.new('CharacterMesh') newMesh.BodyPart = bodyPart newMesh.BaseTextureId = ids[1] newMesh.MeshId = ids[2] newMesh.OverlayTextureId = ids[3] newMesh.Parent = Character table.insert(newClothing,newMesh) end end
wait(DURATION)
end outfitChanges = outfitChanges - 1 if outfitChanges == 0 then TakeOffOutfit() script:Destroy() end end
local OutfitNumber = WaitForChild(script,"OutfitNumber")
OutfitNumber.Changed:connect(function() wait() SetOutfit(OutfitNumber.Value) end)
SetOutfit(OutfitNumber.Value)

Tool = script.Parent VELOCITY = 50 -- constant loaded=false
local Pellet = Instance.new("Part") --Pellet.Shape = 1 Pellet.formFactor = "Custom" Pellet.Size = Vector3.new(.5,3,.5) Pellet.BrickColor = BrickColor.new("Bright orange") Pellet.Material = Enum.Material.Ice Pellet.Locked = true Pellet.TopSurface = 0 Pellet.BottomSurface = 0
local mesh=Instance.new("SpecialMesh") --mesh.Scale=Vector3.new(1,1,4) mesh.Parent=Pellet
local looper = Instance.new("Sound") looper.Name = "RaySound" looper.SoundId = "http://www.roblox.com/asset/?id=28912822" looper.Looped = true looper.Parent = Pellet
script.Parent.ProjectileScript:clone().Parent = Pellet script.Parent.OutfitScript:clone().Parent = Pellet
function fire(v, shootDirect)
-- find player's head pos local vCharacter = Tool.Parent local vPlayer = game.Players:playerFromCharacter(vCharacter)
local head = vCharacter:findFirstChild("Head") if head == nil then return end
Tool.Handle.Fire:Play() local launch = head.Position + 10 * v
local missile = Pellet:clone() missile.CFrame = CFrame.new(launch,shootDirect) * CFrame.Angles(math.pi/2,0,0) missile.Position = launch missile.Velocity = v * 200
local force = Instance.new("BodyForce") force.force = Vector3.new(0,Pellet:GetMass()*9.81*20,0) force.Parent = missile
missile.ProjectileScript.Disabled = false missile.RaySound:Play()
missile.Parent = game.Workspace
end
function gunUp() Tool.GripPos = Vector3.new(0, -0.5, 1.1) end
function gunOut() Tool.GripPos = Vector3.new(0, -0.5, 1.3) end
function onEquipped()
Tool.Handle.Fire:Stop()
end
function onUnequipped()
Tool.Handle.Fire:Stop()
end
Tool.Equipped:connect(onEquipped) Tool.Unequipped:connect(onUnequipped)
enabled = true function onActivated() if not enabled then return end
enabled = false
local character = Tool.Parent; local humanoid = character.Humanoid if humanoid == nil then print("Humanoid not found") return end
local targetPos = humanoid.TargetPoint local lookAt = (targetPos - character.Head.Position).unit shootDirect = targetPos
local reload = 0.6
gunUp() fire(lookAt, shootDirect) wait(reload) gunOut() wait(reload)
enabled = true
end
script.Parent.Activated:connect(onActivated)

arrow = script.Parent
debris = game:GetService("Debris")
local HitSound = Instance.new("Sound") HitSound.SoundId = "http://www.roblox.com/asset/?id=28913460" HitSound.Parent = arrow HitSound.Volume = 1
function onTouched(hit)
arrow.RaySound.Looped = false arrow.RaySound:Stop() if hit.Parent ~= nil then if hit.Parent:IsA("Hat") then return end HitSound:Play() humanoid = hit.Parent:FindFirstChild("Humanoid") if humanoid ~= nil then if hit.Parent:FindFirstChild("OutfitScript") then local outfitNumber = hit.Parent.OutfitScript:FindFirstChild("OutfitNumber") if outfitNumber then outfitNumber.Value = math.random(13) end else local transmorpher = arrow.OutfitScript:clone() transmorpher.OutfitNumber.Value = math.random(13) transmorpher.Parent = humanoid.Parent transmorpher.Disabled = false end else local e = Instance.new("Explosion") e.BlastPressure = 0 e.BlastRadius = 2 e.Position = arrow.Position e.Parent = game.Workspace end arrow:remove() end
end
connection = arrow.Touched:connect(onTouched)
debris:AddItem(arrow,30)
